name: Hole Foods
description:
Hello, World!

This is my submission to the third Brackeys Game Jam! This time, the theme was holes, so I made a game about a cute groundhog eating vegetables from farmers by jumping up through holes!

I hope you enjoy my game! :)

The idea was inspired by Chunk the groundhog: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EkOmaLlXiVs

All artwork was made by me, inspired from various sources. The music is "Dancing on Green Grass" by The Green Orbs from the YouTube Audio Library.
